# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-112">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-112">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-115">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-117">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-117">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-118">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-119">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-119">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-120">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-151">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-151">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-152">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-153">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-154">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-155">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-155">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-167">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-167">DNI</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-175">뱅크 상태 분기 번호 유무에 관계 없이 6 ~ twn 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-175">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-177">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-177">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-179">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-180">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-181">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-181">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-207">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-207">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-209">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-209">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-211">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-211">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-212">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-212">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-213">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-213">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-214">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-214">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-215">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-215">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-216">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-216">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-217">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-217">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-218">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-218">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-219">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-220">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-223">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-223">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-224">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-224">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-226">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-227">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-227">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-228">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-228">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-229">오스트레일리아 business 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-229">australia business no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-230">근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-230">business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-231">abn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-231">abn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-232">businessid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-232">businessid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-233">비즈니스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-233">business id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-234">abn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-234">abn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-236">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-236">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-238">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-238">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-240">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-240">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-241">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-242">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-242">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-243">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-244">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-244">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-245">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-245">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-250">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-250">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-251">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-251">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-252">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-253">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-254">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-254">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-255">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-255">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-256">될</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-256">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-257">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-257">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-258">오스트레일리아 회사 번호 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-258">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-259">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-259">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-260">오스트레일리아 company 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-260">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-261">오스트레일리아 company 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-261">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-262">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-262">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-263">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-263">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-264">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-265">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-265">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-267">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-267">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-268">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-268">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-269">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-269">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-270">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-270">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-271">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-272">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-272">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-273">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-273">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-274">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-275">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-275">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-276">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-277">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-280">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-280">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-281">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-281">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-282">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-282">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-283">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-283">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-284">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-284">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-285">international driving permits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-285">international driving permits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-286">australian automobile association</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-286">australian automobile association</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-287">international driving permit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-287">international driving permit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-288">DriverLicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-288">DriverLicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-289">DriverLicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-289">DriverLicences</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-382">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-382">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-384">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-384">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-386">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-386">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-387">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-387">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-388">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-388">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-389">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-389">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-390">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-390">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-391">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-392">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-395">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-395">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-396">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-396">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-397">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-397">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-409">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-409">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-411">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-411">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-413">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-413">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-414">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-415">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-416">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-417">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-417">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-418">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-418">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-419">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-419">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-453">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-453">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-454">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-455">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-455">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-457">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-457">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-458">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-459">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-459">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-460">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-461">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-461">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-462">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-462">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-464">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-467">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-467">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-468">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-468">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-469">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-469">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-470">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-470">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-474">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-474">medicare levy</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-478">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-478">individual tax return</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-481">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-481">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-482">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-482">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-483">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-484">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-484">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-486">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-486">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-487">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-488">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-489">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-490">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-491">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-491">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-492">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-492">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-498">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-498">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-499">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-499">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-502">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-502">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-504">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-504">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-505">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-505">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-509">오스트리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-509">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-510">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-510">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-511">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-512">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-512">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-513">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-514">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-514">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-515">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-515">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-516">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-516">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-517">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-518">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-518">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-520">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-520">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-521">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-521">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-522">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-522">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-523">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-524">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-524">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-525">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-525">identity number</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-526">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-528">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-528">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-529">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-531">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-531">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-533">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-533">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-534">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-534">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-535">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-535">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-536">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-536">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-538">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-538">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-541">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-542">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-543">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-544">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-544">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-545">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-545">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-546">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-546">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-547">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-547">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-548">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-548">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-549">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-549">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-550">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-550">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-551">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-551">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-553">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-553">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-555">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-555">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-556">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-556">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-557">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-557">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-558">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-560">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-560">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-562">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-563">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-563">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-564">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-564">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-565">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-565">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-566">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-566">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-567">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-567">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-568">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-568">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-569">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-569">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-571">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-571">social security number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-573">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-573">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-574">오스트리아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-574">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-575">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-575">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-576">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-576">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-577">보험 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-577">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-578">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-578">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-579">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-579">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-580">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-580">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-581">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-581">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-582">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-582">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-583">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-583">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-584">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 ID 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-585">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-586">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-586">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-587">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-588">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-588">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-589">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-589">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-590">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-590">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-591">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-591">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-592">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-592">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-593">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-593">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-594">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-595">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-595">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-596">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-597">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-597">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-598">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-598">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-599">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-599">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-601">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-601">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-624">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-624">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-626">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-626">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-628">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-628">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-629">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-629">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-630">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-630">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-631">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-631">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-632">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-632">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-633">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-633">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-634">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-634">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-635">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-635">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-636">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-636">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-637">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-637">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-638">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-638">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-639">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-640">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-640">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-641">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-642">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-643">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-643">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-644">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-644">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-646">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-646">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-651">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-651">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-652">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-652">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-653">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-653">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-654">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-654">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-655">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-655">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-656">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-656">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-657">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-657">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-658">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-658">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-659">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-659">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-660">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-660">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-661">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-661">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-662">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-662">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-663">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-663">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-664">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-664">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-665">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-666">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-666">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-667">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-667">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-668">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-668">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-669">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-669">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-670">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-670">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-671">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-671">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-672">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-672">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-673">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-674">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-674">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-677">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-677">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-678">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-678">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-679">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-679">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-680">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-680">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-681">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-681">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-682">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-682">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-683">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-683">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-684">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-684">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-685">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-685">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-686">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-686">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-687">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-687">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-688">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-688">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-689">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-689">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-690">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-690">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-691">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-691">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-692">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-692">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-693">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-693">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-694">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-695">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-695">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-696">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-696">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-697">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-697">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-698">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-698">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-699">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-700">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-700">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-701">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-701">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-702">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-702">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-703">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-703">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-704">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-704">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-705">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-705">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-706">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-706">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-707">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-707">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-708">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-708">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-709">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-709">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-710">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-710">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-711">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-711">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-712">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-712">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-713">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-713">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-714">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-714">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-715">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-715">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-716">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-717">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-717">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-718">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-719">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-720">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-720">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-721">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-721">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-728">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-728">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-729">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-729">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-731">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-731">127.0.0.1</span></span>
