## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-736">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-736">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-737">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-738">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-738">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-739">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-739">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-740">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-741">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-741">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-742">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-742">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-743">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-743">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-744">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-744">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-745">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-745">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-746">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-746">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-747">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-747">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-748">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-748">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-749">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-749">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-750">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-750">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-751">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-751">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-752">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-752">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-753">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-753">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-754">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-754">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-756">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-759">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-759">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-760">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-760">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-775">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-775">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-776">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-777">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-777">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-778">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-779">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-779">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-780">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-780">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-781">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-781">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-782">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-783">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-783">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-784">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-785">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-785">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-786">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-786">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-787">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-787">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-790">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-790">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-791">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-791">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-792">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-792">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-793">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-793">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-794">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-794">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-795">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-795">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-796">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-796">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-797">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-797">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-800">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-800">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-801">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-801">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-802">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-802">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-803">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-804">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-804">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-805">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-805">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-806">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-806">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-807">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-807">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-808">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-808">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-809">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-809">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-810">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-810">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-811">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-811">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-812">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-812">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-813">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-813">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-814">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-814">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-815">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-815">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-816">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-817">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-818">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-819">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-819">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-820">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-820">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-821">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-821">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-822">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-823">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-823">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-824">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-824">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-825">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-825">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-826">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-826">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-827">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-827">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-828">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-828">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-829">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-829">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-830">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-830">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-831">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-831">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-832">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-832">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-833">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-833">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-834">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-834">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-835">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-835">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-836">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-836">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-837">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-838">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-838">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-840">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-840">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-841">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-842">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-842">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-843">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-843">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-844">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-844">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-845">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-845">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-846">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-846">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-847">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-848">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-848">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-849">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-850">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-850">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-851">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-851">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-852">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-852">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-853">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-853">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-854">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-854">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-855">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-855">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-856">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-856">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-857">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-857">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-858">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-858">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-859">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-859">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-860">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-860">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-861">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-861">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-862">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-862">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-863">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-863">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-864">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-864">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-865">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-865">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-866">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-866">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-867">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-867">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-868">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-868">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-869">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-869">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-870">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-870">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-871">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-872">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-872">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-873">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-874">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-875">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-875">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-876">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-876">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-877">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-877">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-879">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-879">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-891">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-891">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-892">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-893">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-893">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-894">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-895">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-895">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-896">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-897">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-898">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-899">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-899">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-900">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-900">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-901">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-902">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-903">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-904">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-904">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-905">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-905">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-906">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-907">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-907">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-910">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-910">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-911">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-911">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-912">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-912">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-913">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-913">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-918">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-918">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-922">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-922">sandbox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-930">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-930">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-931">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-932">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-932">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-933">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-933">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-934">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-934">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-935">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-935">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-936">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-936">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-938">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-941">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-941">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-942">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-942">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-943">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-943">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-944">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-945">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-945">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-946">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-946">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-947">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-947">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-948">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-949">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-949">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-950">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-951">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-952">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-952">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-953">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-953">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-955">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-955">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-959">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-959">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-961">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-961">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-962">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-962">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-963">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-963">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-964">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-964">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-965">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-965">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-966">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-966">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-967">rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-967">rijbewijs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-968">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-968">rijbewijsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-969">führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-969">führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-970">fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-970">fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-971">fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-971">fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-973">fuehrerschein-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-973">fuehrerschein- Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-974">fuehrerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-974">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-975">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-975">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-976">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-976">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-978">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-978">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-980">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-980">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-981">YY 형식의 6 자리 숫자와 두 기간 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-981">six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-982">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-982">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-983">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-983">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-984">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-984">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-985">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-985">two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-987">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-990">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-990">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-991">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-991">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1051">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1052">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1053">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1054">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1056">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1057">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1058">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1059">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1061">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1062">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1063">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1063">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1064">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1064">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1065">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1065">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1066">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1066">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1067">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1067">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1068">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1068">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1069">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1069">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1070">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1070">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1071">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1071">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1072">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1073">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1074">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1075">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1076">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1077">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1078">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1079">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1082">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1083">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1105">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1105">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1106">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1106">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1107">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1108">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1108">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1110">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1110">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1111">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1111">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1112">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1112">a "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1113">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1113">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1114">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1114">a "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1115">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1115">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1116">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1116">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1117">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1117">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1118">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1118">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1119">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1119">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1120">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1120">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1121">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1121">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1180">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1180">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1181">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1182">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1182">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1184">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1184">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1185">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1185">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1186">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1186">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1187">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1187">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1188">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1188">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1189">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1189">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1190">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1190">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1191">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1191">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1192">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1192">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1193">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1194">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1194">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1195">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1196">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1196">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1197">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1197">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1198">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1198">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1200">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1200">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1202">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1202">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1204">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1204">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1205">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1205">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1206">numéro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1206">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1207">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1207">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1208">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1208">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1212">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1212">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1213">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1214">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1214">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1215">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1215">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1216">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1216">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1217">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1218">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1218">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1219">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1220">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1220">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1221">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1222">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1222">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1223">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1223">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1224">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1224">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1225">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1225">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1226">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1227">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1227">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1228">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1229">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1230">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1230">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1231">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1231">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1232">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1232">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1233">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1234">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1234">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1235">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1235">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1247">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1247">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1248">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1249">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1249">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1251">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1251">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1252">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1252">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1253">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1253">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1254">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1254">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1255">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1255">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1256">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1256">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1257">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1257">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1258">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1258">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1259">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1259">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1260">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1260">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1265">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1265">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1266">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1266">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1267">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1267">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1268">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1268">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1269">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1269">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1270">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1270">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1292">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1292">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1293">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1294">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1294">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1295">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1295">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1296">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1297">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1297">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1298">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1298">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1299">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1299">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1300">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1300">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1301">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1301">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1302">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1302">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1303">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1304">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1304">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1305">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1305">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1306">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1306">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1307">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1307">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1308">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1308">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1309">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1310">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1310">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1312">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1313">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1313">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1314">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1314">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1315">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1315">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1316">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1316">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1317">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1317">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1318">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1318">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1319">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1319">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1320">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1320">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1321">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1321">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1322">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1322">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1323">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1323">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1324">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1324">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1325">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1325">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1326">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1326">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1327">RG(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1327">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1328">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1328">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1329">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1329">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1332">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1332">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1334">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1334">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1336">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1336">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1339">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1340">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1346">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1346">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1351">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1351">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1352">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1352">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1353">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1353">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1356">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1356">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1359">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1359">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1360">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1360">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1362">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1362">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1364">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1364">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1365">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1365">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1366">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1366">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1367">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1367">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1368">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1368">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1370">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1370">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1372">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1373">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1373">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1374">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1374">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1375">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1375">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1376">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1376">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1377">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1377">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_national_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1378">Keywords_bulgaria_national_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1378">Keywords_bulgaria_national_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1379">bnn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1379">bnn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1380">bnn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1380">bnn</span></span>
