## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1421">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1421">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1422">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1422">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1423">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1424">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1424">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1425">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1426">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1426">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1427">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1428">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1428">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1429">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1430">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1430">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1431">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1431">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1432">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1432">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1433">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1433">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1434">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1434">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1435">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1435">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1436">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1436">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1437">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1437">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1438">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1438">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1439">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1439">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1440">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1440">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1441">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1442">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1442">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1443">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1444">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1444">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1445">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1446">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1446">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1447">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1448">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1449">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1449">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1450">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1450">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1451">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1452">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1452">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1487">лична идентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1487">лична идентификация</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1497">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1497">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1498">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1499">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1499">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1501">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1501">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1502">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1502">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1503">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1503">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1504">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1505">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1505">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1506">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1506">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1507">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1507">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1508">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1509">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1509">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1510">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1511">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1511">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1512">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1512">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1513">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1513">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1514">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1514">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1516">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1516">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1517">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1517">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1541">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1541">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1542">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1543">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1543">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1545">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1545">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1546">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1547">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1547">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1548">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1549">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1550">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1550">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1551">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1551">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1552">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1552">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1688">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1688">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1689">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1690">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1690">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1692">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1692">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1693">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1694">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1694">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1697">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1697">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1698">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1698">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1699">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1700">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1700">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1701">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1701">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1702">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1702">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1703">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1703">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1704">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1704">speciality services</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1710">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1710">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1711">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1712">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1712">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1713">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1714">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1714">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1715">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1716">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1719">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1719">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1720">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1720">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1721">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1721">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1750">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1750">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1752">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1752">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1754">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1754">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1756">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1759">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1759">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1760">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1760">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1793">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1793">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1794">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1795">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1795">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1797">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1797">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1798">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1798">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1799">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1799">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1800">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1800">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1801">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1801">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1802">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1802">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1803">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1803">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1804">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1805">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1805">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1808">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1808">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1809">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1809">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1810">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1810">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1811">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1811">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1812">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1812">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1813">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1813">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1814">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1814">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1815">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1815">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1816">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1816">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1817">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1817">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1833">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1833">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1842">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1842">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1843">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1844">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1844">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1845">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1845">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1846">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1846">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1847">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1847">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1848">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1848">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1849">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1849">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1850">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1850">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1851">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1851">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1852">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1852">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1853">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1853">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1854">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1855">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1858">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1858">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1859">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1859">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1860">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1860">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1861">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1861">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1862">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1862">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1863">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1863">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1865">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1865">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1866">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1866">National Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1869">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1869">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1870">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1870">Rol Único Nacional</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1872">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1872">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1873">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1873">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1874">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1874">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1875">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1875">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1876">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1876">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1877">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1877">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1878">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1878">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1879">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1880">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1880">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1881">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1882">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1882">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1883">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1883">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1884">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1884">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1885">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1885">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1886">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1886">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1887">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1888">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1888">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1889">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1890">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1890">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1891">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1891">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1892">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1892">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1893">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1893">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1894">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1895">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1895">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1896">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1896">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1897">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1897">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1898">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1898">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1899">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1899">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1904">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1904">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1905">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1905">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1906">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1906">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1907">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1907">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1909">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1909">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1910">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1911">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1911">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1912">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1913">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1913">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1914">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1915">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1915">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1916">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1917">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1918">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1918">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1919">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1919">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1920">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1920">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1921">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1921">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1922">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1922">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1923">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1923">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1924">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1924">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1925">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1925">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-1926">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-1926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2186">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2186">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2187">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2189">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2189">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2191">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2191">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2192">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2193">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2193">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2196">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2196">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2197">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2197">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2198">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2198">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2202">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2202">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2203">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2203">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2204">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2204">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2205">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2205">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2207">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2207">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2208">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2208">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2209">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2209">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2210">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2210">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2213">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2213">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2214">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2214">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2215">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2216">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2216">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2217">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2218">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2218">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2219">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2220">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2220">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2223">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2223">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2224">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2224">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2225">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2225">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2255">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2255">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2256">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2258">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2258">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2260">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2260">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2262">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2265">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2265">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2266">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2266">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2267">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2267">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2268">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2268">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2269">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2269">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2271">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2271">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2273">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2273">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2274">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2275">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2275">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2277">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2277">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2278">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2278">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2279">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2279">final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2280">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2281">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2281">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2282">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2283">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2283">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2284">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2284">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2285">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2285">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2286">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2287">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2288">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2288">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2289">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2289">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2290">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2290">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2291">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2291">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2292">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2292">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2293">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2293">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2294">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2294">OIB</span></span> 


## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2295">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2295">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2296">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2296">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2297">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2298">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2298">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2299">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2300">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2300">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2301">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2301">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2302">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2302">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2303">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2304">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2304">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2305">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2306">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2306">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2307">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2307">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2308">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2308">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2309">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2309">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2310">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2310">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2312">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2312">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2314">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2314">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2315">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2315">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2316">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2316">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2317">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2317">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2318">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2318">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2319">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2319">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2320">nationalnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2320">nationalnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2321">bnn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2321">bnn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2322">bnn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2322">bnn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2323">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2323">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2324">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2324">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2325">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2325">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2326">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2326">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2327">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2327">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2328">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2330">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2330">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2332">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2332">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2333">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2333">ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2334">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2334">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2339">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2339">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2340">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2340">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2342">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2342">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2343">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2343">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2344">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2344">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2345">majstorski broj građana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2345">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2346">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2346">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2347">nacidentifikacijski alni broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2347">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2373">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2373">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2374">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2374">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2375">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2376">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2376">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2377">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2378">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2378">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2379">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2379">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2380">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2380">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2381">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2381">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2382">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2383">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2383">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2384">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2384">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2385">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2385">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2387">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2387">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2389">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2389">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2390">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2390">driver licence</span></span>
