- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2392">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2392">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2393">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2393">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2394">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2394">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2395">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2395">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2396">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2396">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2397">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2397">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2398">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2398">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2399">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2399">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2400">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2400">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2402">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2402">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2403">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2404">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2404">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2405">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2405">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2406">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2406">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2407">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2407">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2408">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2408">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2409">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2409">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2410">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2410">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2411">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2411">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2412">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2412">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2413">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2413">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2414">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2414">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2415">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2415">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2416">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2416">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2417">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2417">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2418">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2418">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2419">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2419">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2420">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2421">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2422">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2422">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2423">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2424">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2424">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2425">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2426">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2426">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2427">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2428">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2428">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2429">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2429">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2430">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2430">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2431">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2432">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2432">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2433">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2433">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2434">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2434">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2435">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2435">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2437">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2437">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2438">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2439">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2440">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2440">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2442">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2442">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2443">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2443">a "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2444">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2444">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2445">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2445">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2446">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2447">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2447">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2448">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2449">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2450">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2450">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2451">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2451">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2453">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2453">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2482">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2482">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2483">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2485">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2485">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2487">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2487">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2488">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2488">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2489">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2489">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2490">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2490">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2495">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2495">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2496">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2496">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2497">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2497">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2498">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2498">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2501">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2501">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2502">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2502">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2503">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2503">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2504">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2504">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2505">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2505">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2506">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2506">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2507">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2507">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2508">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2508">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2509">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2509">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2510">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2510">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2511">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2511">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2512">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2512">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>


## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2513">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2513">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2514">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2514">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2515">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2516">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2516">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2518">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2518">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2519">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2520">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2520">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2521">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2523">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2523">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2524">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2524">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2525">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2525">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2526">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2526">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2527">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2527">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2528">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2528">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2529">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2529">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2530">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2530">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2531">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2531">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2532">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2532">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2533">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2533">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2534">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2535">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2535">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2536">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2537">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2537">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2538">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2538">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2539">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2539">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2540">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2540">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2541">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2541">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2542">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2542">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2543">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2543">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2544">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2544">ten digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2545">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2545">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2546">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2546">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2547">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2547">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2548">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2548">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2553">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2553">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2554">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2554">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2555">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2556">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2557">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2557">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2558">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2558">Rodné číslo</span></span>


## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2559">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2559">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2562">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2562">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2564">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2564">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2565">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2565">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2566">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2566">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2567">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2567">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2568">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2568">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2569">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2570">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2570">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2572">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2573">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2573">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2574">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2574">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2575">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2575">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2576">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2576">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2577">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2577">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2578">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2578">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2579">돌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2579">birth number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2580">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2580">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2581">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2581">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2582">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2582">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2583">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2583">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2584">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2584">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2585">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2585">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2586">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2586">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2587">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2587">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2588">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2588">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2589">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2589">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2590">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2590">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2591">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2591">rodne cislo</span></span>


## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2592">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2592">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2593">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2593">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2595">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2595">nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2596">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2597">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2597">nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2598">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2598">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2599">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2599">a backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2600">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2600">three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2601">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2602">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2602">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2604">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2605">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2605">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2606">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2606">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2607">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2607">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2608">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2608">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2609">체코어 공화국 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2609">czech republic id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2610">czechidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2610">czechidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2611">daňové číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2611">daňové číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2612">identifikační číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2612">identifikační číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2613">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2613">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2614">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2614">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2615">identityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2615">identityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2616">identityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2616">identityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2617">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2617">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2618">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2618">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2619">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2619">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2620">osobní číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2620">osobní číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2621">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2621">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2622">개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2622">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2623">인 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2623">pid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2624">인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2624">pid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2625">pojištění číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2625">pojištění číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2626">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2626">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2627">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2627">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2628">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2628">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2629">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2629">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2630">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2630">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2631">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2631">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2632">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2632">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2633">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2633">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2634">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2634">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2644">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2644">tax number</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2645">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2645">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2646">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2646">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2647">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2648">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2648">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2649">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2650">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2650">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2651">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2652">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2652">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2653">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2654">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2655">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2655">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2656">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2656">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2657">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2661">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2661">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2662">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2662">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2663">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2663">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2666">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2666">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2667">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2667">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2668">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2668">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2669">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2669">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2670">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2670">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2673">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2673">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2674">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2674">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2675">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2676">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2676">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2677">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2678">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2678">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2679">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2679">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2680">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2680">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2681">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2681">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2682">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2682">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2683">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2683">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2684">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2684">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2685">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2685">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2686">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2686">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2687">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2687">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2688">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2688">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2689">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2689">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2690">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2690">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2691">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2691">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2692">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2692">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2693">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2693">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2694">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2695">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2695">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2697">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2697">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2698">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2698">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2699">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2699">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2700">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2700">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2701">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2702">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2704">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2705">정규식 Regex_denmark_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2705">The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2706">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2706">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2707">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2707">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2717">건강 보험 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2717">health insurance card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2718">건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2718">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2719">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2719">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2720">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2720">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2722">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2722">identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2725">personalidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2725">personalidentityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2726">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2726">personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2727">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2727">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2728">reisekrankenversicherungskartenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2728">reisekrankenversicherungskartenummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2729">rejsesygesikringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2729">rejsesygesikringskort</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2759">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2759">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2760">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2760">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2761">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2762">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2762">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2763">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2764">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2764">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2765">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2765">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2766">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2766">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2767">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2767">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2768">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2772">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2772">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2773">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2773">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2775">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2775">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2789">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2789">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2790">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2790">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2791">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2792">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2792">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2794">hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2794">ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2795">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2795">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2796">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2796">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2797">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2797">four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2798">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2799">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2799">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2801">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2802">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2802">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2803">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2803">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2804">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2805">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2805">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2835">sundhedskortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2835">sundhedskortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2857">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2857">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2858">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2859">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2859">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2860">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2861">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2861">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2862">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2862">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2863">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2863">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2864">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2864">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2865">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2866">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2867">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2868">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2869">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2869">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2870">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2871">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2871">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2872">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2872">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2873">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2873">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2874">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2874">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2876">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2876">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2878">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2878">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2879">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2879">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2880">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2880">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2881">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2882">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2882">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2883">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2884">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2884">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2885">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2885">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2886">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2886">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2887">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2888">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2888">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2889">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2889">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2890">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2890">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2891">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2891">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2892">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2892">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2893">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2893">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2894">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2894">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2895">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2895">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2896">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2896">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2897">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2897">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2898">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2898">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2899">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2899">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2900">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2900">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2901">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2901">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2902">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2902">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2903">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2903">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2904">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2905">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2905">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2907">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2907">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2908">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2908">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2909">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2909">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2910">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2910">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2911">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2911">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2912">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2913">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2913">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2914">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2915">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2915">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2916">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2916">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2917">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2917">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2918">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2919">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2919">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2920">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2920">Keywords</span></span>
