## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2952">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2952">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2953">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2953">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2954">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2955">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2955">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2956">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2956">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2957">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2957">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2958">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2959">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2960">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2961">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2961">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2962">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2962">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2963">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2963">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2964">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2964">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2965">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2965">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2966">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2966">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2967">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2967">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2968">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2968">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2969">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2969">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2970">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2970">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2971">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2971">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2972">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2973">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2973">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2974">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2975">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2975">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2976">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2976">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2977">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2977">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2978">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2978">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2979">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2979">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2980">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2981">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2984">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2984">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2985">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2985">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-2987">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-2987">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3020">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3020">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3021">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3022">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3022">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3024">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3024">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3025">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3026">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3026">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3028">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3028">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3029">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3029">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3030">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3030">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3031">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3031">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3032">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3032">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3033">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3033">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3034">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3034">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3035">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3035">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3036">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3036">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3482">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3482">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3483">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3485">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3485">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3487">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3487">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3488">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3488">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3489">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3489">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3490">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3490">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3495">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3495">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3496">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3496">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3497">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3497">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3512">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3512">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3513">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3514">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3514">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3516">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3516">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3517">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3517">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3518">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3518">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3519">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3519">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3520">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3521">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3523">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3524">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3524">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3525">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3525">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3543">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3543">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3544">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3544">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3545">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3546">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3546">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3547">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3548">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3548">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3549">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3549">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3550">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3550">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3551">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3551">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3552">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3552">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3553">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3554">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3554">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3555">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3556">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3556">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3557">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3557">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3558">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3558">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3559">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3559">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3605">veronumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3605">veronumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3606">verotunniste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3606">verotunniste</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3608">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3608">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3609">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3609">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3610">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3610">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3611">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3611">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3612">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3613">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3613">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3614">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3614">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3615">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3616">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3617">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3620">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3620">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3621">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3621">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3622">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3622">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3624">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3624">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3625">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3625">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3626">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3626">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3627">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3627">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3628">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3629">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3629">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3630">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3631">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3631">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3632">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3632">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3633">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3633">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3634">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3634">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3635">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3635">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3636">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3636">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3637">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3637">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3638">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3638">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3639">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3640">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3640">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3641">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3642">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3643">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3643">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3644">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3644">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3646">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3646">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3648">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3648">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3652">핀란드어 국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3652">finnish national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3662">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3662">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3663">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3663">identiteetti numero</span></span>

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3670">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3670">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3671">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3671">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3672">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3673">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3673">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3675">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3675">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3676">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3676">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3677">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3677">one of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3678">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3678">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3679">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3679">one letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3680">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3681">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3681">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3683">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3683">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3684">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3684">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3685">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3685">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3686">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3686">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3687">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3687">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3688">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3689">Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3689">Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3738">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3738">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3739">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3739">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3740">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3741">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3741">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3742">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3743">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3743">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3744">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3745">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3745">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3746">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3747">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3748">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3748">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3749">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3749">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3750">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3750">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3751">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3751">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3752">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3752">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3756">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3756">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3757">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3757">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3758">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3758">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3763">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3763">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3764">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3765">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3765">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3767">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3767">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3768">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3768">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3769">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3769">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3770">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3770">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3771">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3771">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3772">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3772">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3773">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3774">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3776">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3776">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3777">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3777">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3778">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3778">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3779">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3779">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3780">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3780">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3781">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3781">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3782">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3782">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3783">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3783">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3784">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3784">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3785">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3785">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3786">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3787">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3788">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3789">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3789">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3790">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3791">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3793">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3794">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3794">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3796">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3799">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3799">cni#</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3807">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3807">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3808">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3808">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3809">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3810">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3810">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3811">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3812">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3812">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3813">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3813">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3814">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3814">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3815">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3815">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3816">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3817">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3818">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3819">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3820">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3820">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3821">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3821">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3827">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3827">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3828">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3828">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3829">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3829">Passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3833">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3833">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3834">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3834">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3835">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3835">Numéro de passeport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3840">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3840">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3841">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3841">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3842">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3842">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3843">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3843">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3845">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3845">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3847">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3847">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3848">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3848">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3849">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3849">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3850">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3850">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3851">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3852">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3854">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3854">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3855">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3855">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3856">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3856">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3857">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3857">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3858">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3858">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3859">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3859">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3860">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3860">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3861">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3861">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3863">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3863">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3875">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3875">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3876">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3876">d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3887">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3887">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3888">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3888">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3889">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3890">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3890">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3891">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3892">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3892">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3893">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3893">one digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3894">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3894">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3895">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3895">nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3896">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3897">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3897">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3898">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3899">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3899">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3900">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3900">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3901">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3901">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3902">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3903">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3903">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3907">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3907">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3908">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3908">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3909">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3909">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3910">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3910">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3911">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3911">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3914">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3914">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3915">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3915">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3916">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3916">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3923">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3923">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3924">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3925">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3925">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3926">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3927">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3927">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3928">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3928">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3929">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3929">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3930">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3930">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3931">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3931">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3932">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3932">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3933">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3933">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3934">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3934">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3935">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3935">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3936">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3936">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3938">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3938">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3941">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3941">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3942">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3942">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3944">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3944">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3945">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3945">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3946">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3946">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3947">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3947">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3948">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3948">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3949">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3949">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3950">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3950">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3951">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3951">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3952">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3952">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3953">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3953">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3954">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3954">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3955">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3955">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3956">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3956">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3957">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3957">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3958">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3959">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3960">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3960">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3961">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3962">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3962">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3963">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3963">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3964">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3964">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3965">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3965">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3966">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3966">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3967">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3967">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3968">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3969">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3969">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3970">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3971">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3972">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3972">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3973">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3973">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3974">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3974">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3975">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3975">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3976">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3976">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3977">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3978">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3978">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3979">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3979">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3980">Führerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3980">Führerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3981">Fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3981">Fuhrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3982">Fuehrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3982">Fuehrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3983">Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3983">Führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3984">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3984">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-3985">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-3985">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4070">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4070">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4071">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4071">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4072">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4072">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4073">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4074">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4074">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4075">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4075">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4076">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4077">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4077">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4078">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4078">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4079">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4079">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4080">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4080">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4081">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4081">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4082">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4082">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4083">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4083">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4084">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4084">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4085">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4085">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4086">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4086">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4087">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4087">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
