- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4101">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4101">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4102">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4102">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4103">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4103">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4104">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4104">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4105">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4106">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4106">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4107">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4108">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4108">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4109">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4109">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4110">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4110">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4111">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4111">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4112">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4112">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4113">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4114">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4115">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4116">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4117">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4117">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4118">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4118">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4119">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4120">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4121">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4121">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4122">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4122">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4123">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4123">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4141">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4141">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4142">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4142">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4143">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4144">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4144">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4145">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4146">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4146">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4147">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4147">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4148">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4148">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4149">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4150">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4152">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4153">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4154">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4156">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4166">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4166">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4167">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4167">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4168">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4168">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4169">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4169">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4170">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4170">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4171">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4171">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4172">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4172">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4173">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4173">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4174">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4174">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4175">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4175">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4176">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4176">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4177">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4177">tin no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4179">zinn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4179">zinn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4180">zinn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4180">zinn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4181">zinnnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4181">zinnnummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4182">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4184">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4184">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4186">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4186">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4187">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4187">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4188">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4188">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4189">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4189">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4190">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4190">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4191">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4191">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4192">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4192">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4193">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4193">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4194">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4194">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4195">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4196">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4199">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4199">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4200">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4200">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4202">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4202">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4203">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4203">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4205">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4205">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4206">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4206">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4207">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4207">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4208">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4208">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4209">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4209">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4210">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4210">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4211">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4211">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4212">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4212">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4213">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4213">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4215">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4215">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4217">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4217">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4219">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4219">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4222">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4222">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4223">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4223">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4224">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4224">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4228">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4228">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4229">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4229">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4230">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4230">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4231">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4231">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4232">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4232">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4233">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4233">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4234">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4234">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4235">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4235">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4236">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4236">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4239">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4239">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4240">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4240">Greece national ID card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4241">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4241">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4242">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4243">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4243">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4244">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4245">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4245">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4246">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4246">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4247">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4247">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4248">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4248">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4249">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4249">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4250">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4250">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4251">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4251">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4252">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4252">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4253">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4254">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4256">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4257">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4257">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4258">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4258">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4259">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4260">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4260">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4261">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4261">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4262">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4262">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4263">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4263">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4264">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4264">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4265">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4265">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4266">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4266">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4267">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4267">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4268">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4268">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4269">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4269">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4270">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4270">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4271">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4272">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4272">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4274">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4274">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4276">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4279">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4279">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4280">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4280">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4281">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4281">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4287">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4287">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4288">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4290">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4290">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4292">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4292">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4294">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4296">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4297">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4297">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4298">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4298">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4327">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4327">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4328">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4329">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4329">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4331">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4331">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4332">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4332">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4333">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4334">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4334">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4339">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4339">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4340">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4340">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4342">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4343">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4343">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4344">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4344">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4380">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4380">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4381">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4381">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4382">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4382">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4383">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4383">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4384">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4384">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4385">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4385">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4386">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4387">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4387">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4388">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4389">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4389">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4390">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4390">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4391">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4391">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4392">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4393">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4394">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4395">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4395">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4396">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4396">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4397">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4397">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4398">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4398">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4400">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4400">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4401">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4401">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4402">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4402">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4403">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4403">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4404">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4404">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4405">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4405">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4406">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4406">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4407">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4407">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4408">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4408">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4409">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4409">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4410">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4410">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4411">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4411">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4412">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4412">vezetoi engedely</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4413">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4413">Hungary national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4414">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4415">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4416">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4416">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4418">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4418">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4419">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4419">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4420">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4420">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4421">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4421">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4422">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4422">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4423">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4424">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4424">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4427">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4427">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4428">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4428">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4430">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4430">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4431">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4432">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4432">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4433">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4433">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4434">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4434">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4435">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4435">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4436">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4436">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4437">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4437"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4438">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4438">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4439">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4439">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4440">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4440">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4441">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4441">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4442">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4444">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4444">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4446">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4446">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4447">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4448">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4448">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4451">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4451">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4452">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4452">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4453">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4454">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4454">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4455">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4455">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4456">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4456">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4457">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4457">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4458">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4458">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4459">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4459">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4460">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4460">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4461">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4462">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4462">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4464">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4464">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4465">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4466">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4466">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4468">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4469">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4469">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4470">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4470">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4471">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4472">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4472">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4492">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4492">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4493">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4494">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4495">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4495">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4497">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4497">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4498">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4498">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4499">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4499">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4500">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4500">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4501">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4501">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4503">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4505">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4506">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4506">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4507">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4507">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4508">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4509">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4509">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4521">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4521">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4522">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4522">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4535">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4535">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4536">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4537">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4537">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4539">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4539">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4540">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4540">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4541">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4541">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4542">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4542">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4543">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4543">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4544">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4544">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4545">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4545">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4546">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4546">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4547">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4547">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4548">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4548">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4549">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4550">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4550">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4551">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4552">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4552">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4553">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4553">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4554">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4554">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4555">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4555">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4556">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4556">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4557">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4557">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4558">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4558">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4559">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4559">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4560">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4560">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4561">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4561">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4562">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4562">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4563">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4563">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4564">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4564">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4565">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4566">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4566">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4568">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4568">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4569">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4569">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4570">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4570">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4571">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4571">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4572">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4573">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4574">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4575">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4576">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4576">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4577">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4577">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4578">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4578">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4579">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4579">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4580">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4580">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4581">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4581">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4582">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4582">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4583">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4583">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4584">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4584">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4585">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4585">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4586">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4586">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4587">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4587">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4588">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4588">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4589">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4589">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4590">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4590">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4591">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4591">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4592">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4592">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4593">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4594">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4594">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4595">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4596">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4596">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4597">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4597">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4598">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4598">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4599">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4599">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4601">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4601">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4602">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4602">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4603">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4603">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4604">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4604">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4605">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4605">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4606">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4606">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4607">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4607">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4608">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4608">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4609">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4609">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4610">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4611">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4611">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4613">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4613">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4614">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4614">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4615">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4615">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4616">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4616">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4617">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4617">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4618">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4618">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4619">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4619">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4620">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4620">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4621">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4621">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4622">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4623">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4623">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4624">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4625">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4625">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4626">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4626">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4627">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4627">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4628">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4628">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4630">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4630">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4631">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4631">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4632">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4632">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4633">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4633">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4635">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4635">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4637">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4637">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4638">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4638">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4639">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4639">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4640">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4640">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4641">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4641">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4642">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4642">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4643">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4643">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4644">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4644">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4649">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4649">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4650">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
