<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4652">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4652">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4653">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4653">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4654">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4655">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4655">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4657">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4657">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4658">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4659">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4661">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4661">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4662">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4662">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4663">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4663">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4665">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4665">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4666">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4666">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4667">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4667">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4668">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4668">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4669">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4669">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4670">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4670">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4671">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4671">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4672">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4673">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4673">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4675">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4675">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4676">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4676">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4677">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4677">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4678">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4678">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4679">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4679">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4680">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4680">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4681">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4681">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4682">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4682">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4683">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4683">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4684">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4684">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4687">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4687">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4688">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4688">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4689">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4689">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4690">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4690">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4691">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4691">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4692">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4692">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4693">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4693">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4694">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4694">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4695">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4697">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4699">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4699">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4700">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4700">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4701">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4701">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4702">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4702">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4703">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4703">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4704">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4704">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4705">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4705">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4706">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4706">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4707">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4707">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4708">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4708">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4709">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4709">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4710">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4710">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4711">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4711">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4712">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4712">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4713">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4713">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4714">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4714">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4715">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4715">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4716">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4716">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4717">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4717">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4718">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4718">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4719">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4719">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4720">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4720">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4721">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4721">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4722">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4722">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4727">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4727">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4728">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4728">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4744">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4744">Ireland national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4745">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4745">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4746">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4747">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4747">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4749">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4749">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4750">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4750">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4751">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4751">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4752">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4752">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4753">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4753">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4754">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4754">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4755">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4755">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4756">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4756">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4757">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4757">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4762">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4762">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4763">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4763">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4765">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4765">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4794">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4794">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4795">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4795">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4796">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4797">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4797">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4799">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4799">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4800">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4800">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4801">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4801">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4802">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4803">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4803">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4804">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4805">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4806">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4806">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4807">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4807">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4817">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4817">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4818">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4819">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4819">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4820">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4820">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4821">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4821">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4822">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4822">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4823">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4824">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4824">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4825">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4825">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4826">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4826">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4827">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4827">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4828">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4828">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4829">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4829">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4830">문자 "A" 또는 "H" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4830">the letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4831">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4832">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4832">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4833">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4835">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4835">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4836">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4836">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4837">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4837">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4838">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4838">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4839">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4840">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4840">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4841">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4841">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4842">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4846">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4846">PPS Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4848">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4848">PPS No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4856">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4856">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4857">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4857">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4858">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4858">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4859">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4860">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4860">seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4862">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4862">seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4863">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4863">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4864">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4864">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4865">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4866">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4866">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4867">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4868">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4869">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4869">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4870">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4870">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4871">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4872">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4872">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4901">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4901">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4903">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4903">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4905">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4905">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4906">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4906">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4907">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4907">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4908">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4908">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4909">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4909">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4910">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4910">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4911">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4911">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4912">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4912">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4913">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4914">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4916">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4917">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4917">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4918">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4918">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4919">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4919">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4920">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4920">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4925">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4925">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4926">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4926">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4927">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4927">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4928">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4928">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4929">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4929">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4933">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4934">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4934">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4935">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4935">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4936">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4937">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4939">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4939">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4940">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4940">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4941">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4941">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4942">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4942">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4943">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4944">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4944">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4945">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4945">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4946">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4946">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4947">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4947">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4948">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4948">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4949">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4949">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4950">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4950">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4951">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4952">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4953">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4954">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4954">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4955">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4955">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4956">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4956">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4957">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4957">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4958">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4958">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4959">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4959">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4960">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4960">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4961">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4961">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4962">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4962">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4963">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4964">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4964">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4966">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4966">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4967">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4967">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4968">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4968">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4969">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4969">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4970">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4970">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4971">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4971">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4972">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4972">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4973">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4973">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4974">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4975">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4975">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4978">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4978">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4979">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4979">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4980">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4980">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4981">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4981">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4982">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4982">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4983">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4983">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4986">codice id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4986">codice id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4987">codice personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4987">codice personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4988">회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4988">fiscal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4989">numero certificato personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4989">numero certificato personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4990">numero di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4990">numero di identificazione fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4991">numero id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4991">numero id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4992">numero personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4992">numero personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4993">개인 인증서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4993">personal certificate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4994">개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4994">personal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4995">개인 id 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4995">personal id code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4996">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4996">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-4997">personalcodeno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-4997">personalcodeno#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5016">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5016">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5017">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5017">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5018">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5019">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5019">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5021">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5021">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5022">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5022">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5023">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5023">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5024">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5025">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5025">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5026">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5027">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5027">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5028">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5028">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5029">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5029">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5030">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5030">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5031">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5031">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5032">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5032">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5033">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5033">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5034">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5034">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5035">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5035">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5036">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5036">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5037">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5037">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5038">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5038">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5039">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5039">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5040">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5040">numéro passeport</span></span>


## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5041">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5041">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5042">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5042">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5043">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5044">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5044">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5046">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5046">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5047">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5047">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5048">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5048">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5049">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5049">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5050">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5050">one digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5051">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5051">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5052">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5052">four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5053">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5053">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5054">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5055">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5055">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5056">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5058">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5058">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5059">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5059">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5061">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5061">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5096">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5096">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5097">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5098">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5098">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5099">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5100">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5100">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5101">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5101">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5102">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5102">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5103">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5103">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5104">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5104">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5105">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5106">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5107">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5108">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5109">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5109">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5110">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5110">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5112">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5112">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5113">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5113">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5114">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5114">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5115">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5115">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5116">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5116">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5117">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5117">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5118">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5118">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5119">iva #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5119">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5120">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5120">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5122">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5122">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5124">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5124">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5125">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5125">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5126">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5126">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5127">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5127">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5128">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5128">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5129">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5129">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5134">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5134">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5135">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5135">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5136">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5136">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5137">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5137">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5138">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5138">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5140">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5140">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5141">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5141">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5200">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5200">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5201">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5202">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5202">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5203">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5203">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5204">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5204">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5205">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5205">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5206">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5206">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5207">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5207">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5208">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5208">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5209">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5209">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5210">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5210">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5238">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5238">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5239">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5240">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5240">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5242">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5242">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5243">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5243">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5244">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5244">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5245">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5246">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5248">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5248">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5249">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5249">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5250">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5250">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5251">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5251">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5252">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5252">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
