## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5265">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5265">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5266">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5267">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5267">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5268">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5269">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5269">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5270">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5270">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5271">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5271">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5272">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5272">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5273">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5273">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5274">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5274">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5276">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5278">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5279">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5279">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5280">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5280">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5281">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5282">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5282">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5295">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5295">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5296">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5297">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5297">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5299">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5299">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5300">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5301">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5302">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5304">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5304">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5305">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5305">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5307">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5307">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5308">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5308">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5309">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5309">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5310">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5310">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5311">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5311">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5312">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5312">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5313">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5314">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5314">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5316">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5316">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5317">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5317">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5318">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5318">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5319">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5319">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5320">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5321">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5321">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5324">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5324">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5325">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5325">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5326">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5326">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5327">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5327">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5328">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5328">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5329">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5329">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5330">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5330">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5331">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5331">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5332">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5332">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5333">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5334">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5334">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5336">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5336">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5337">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5338">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5338">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5339">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5340">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5340">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5341">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5341">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5342">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5342">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5343">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5343">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5344">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5344">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5345">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5345">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5346">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5346">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5347">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5347">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5348">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5348">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5349">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5349">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5350">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5350">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5351">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5351">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5352">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5352">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5353">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5353">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5354">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5354">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5355">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5355">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5356">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5356">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5358">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5358">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5360">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5360">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5361">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5361">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5362">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5362">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5363">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5363">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5364">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5364">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5365">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5365">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5366">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5366">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5367">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5367">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5368">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5368">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5369">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5369">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5370">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5370">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5371">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5372">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5372">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5373">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5373">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5374">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5374">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5375">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5375">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5376">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5376">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5377">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5377">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5378">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5378">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5379">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5379">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5380">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5380">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5381">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5381">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5382">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5382">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5384">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5384">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5386">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5386">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5387">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5387">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5388">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5388">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5389">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5390">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5390">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5391">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5392">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5393">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5393">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5394">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5394">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5400">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5400">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5410">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5410">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5411">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5411">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5412">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5413">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5413">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5414">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5415">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5415">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5416">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5416">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5417">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5417">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5418">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5418">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5419">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5419">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5420">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5421">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5421">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5422">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5424">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5424">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5425">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5427">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5427">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5490">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5490">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5491">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5491">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5492">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5492">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5493">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5493">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5494">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5495">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5495">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5496">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5496">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5497">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5497">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5498">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5499">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5499">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5500">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5502">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5502">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5503">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5503">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5504">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5504">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5505">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5505">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5506">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5506">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5507">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5507">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5508">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5508">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5509">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5509">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5510">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5510">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5511">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5511">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5512">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5513">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5513">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5514">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5515">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5515">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5516">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5516">six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5517">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5517">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5518">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5518">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5519">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5520">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5520">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5521">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5522">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5523">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5523">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5524">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5524">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5525">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5526">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5526">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5587">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5587">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5588">시킵니다 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5588">voter’s number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5589">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5589">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5590">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5592">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5592">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5594">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5594">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5599">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5600">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5606">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5606">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5610">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5610">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5613">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5613">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5616">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5616">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5617">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5617">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5618">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5619">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5619">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5621">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5621">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5622">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5622">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5623">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5623">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5624">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5624">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5625">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5626">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5627">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5629">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5630">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5630">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5631">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5631">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5632">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5632">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5633">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5633">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5668">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5668">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5669">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5669">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5670">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5671">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5671">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5672">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5673">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5673">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5674">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5675">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5675">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5678">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5678">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5679">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5679">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5680">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5680">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5686">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5686">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5687">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5687">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5688">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5689">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5689">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5690">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5691">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5691">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5693">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5693">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5696">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5696">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5697">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5697">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5698">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5698">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5699">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5699">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5733">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5733">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5734">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5734">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5735">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5736">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5736">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5738">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5738">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5739">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5740">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5740">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5743">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5743">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5744">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5744">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5746">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5746">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5750">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5750">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5751">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5751">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5752">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5752">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5753">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5753">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5754">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5754">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5755">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5755">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5756">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5756">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5757">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5757">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5760">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5760">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5761">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5762">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5763">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5763">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5765">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5765">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5766">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5766">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5767">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5767">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5768">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5768">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5769">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5769">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5770">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5771">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5771">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5772">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5773">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5774">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5774">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5775">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5775">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5798">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5798">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5799">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5799">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5800">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5801">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5801">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5802">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5803">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5803">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5804">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5808">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5808">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5809">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5810">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5810">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5814">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5814">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5815">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5815">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5816">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5816">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5817">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5817">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5818">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5819">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5819">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5820">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5821">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5821">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5822">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5822">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5823">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5823">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5824">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5825">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5825">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5827">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5828">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5828">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5829">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5829">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5830">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5830">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5831">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5831">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5871">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5871">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5873">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5873">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5875">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5875">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5876">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5876">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5877">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5877">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5878">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5878">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5879">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5879">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5880">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5880">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5881">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5881">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5886">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5886">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5887">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5887">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5914">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5914">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5915">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5915">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5916">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5917">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5917">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5918">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5919">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5919">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5920">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5920">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5921">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5921">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5922">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5922">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5923">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5923">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5924">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5924">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5925">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5926">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5926">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5927">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5928">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5928">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5929">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5929">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5930">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5936">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5936">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5937">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5937">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5940">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5940">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5941">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5941">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5942">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5942">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5943">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5943">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5944">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5944">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5945">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5945">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5946">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5946">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5947">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5947">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5948">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5949">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5949">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5950">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5951">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5951">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5952">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5952">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5953">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5953">one uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5955">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5955">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5958">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5958">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5959">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5959">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5960">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5961">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5961">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5962">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5962">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5963">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5963">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5964">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5964">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5965">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5965">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5966">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5966">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5967">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5967">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
