- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5969">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5969">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5970">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5970">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5971">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5971">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5972">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5972">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5973">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5973">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5974">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5974">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5975">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5975">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5976">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5976">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5977">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5977">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5978">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5978">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5979">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5979">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5980">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5981">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5981">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5982">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5983">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5983">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5984">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5985">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5985">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5986">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5987">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5987">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5988">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5988">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5989">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5989">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5990">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5990">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5991">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5991">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5992">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5992">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5993">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5993">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5994">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5994">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5995">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5995">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5996">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5996">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5997">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5998">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-5999">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-5999">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6000">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6000">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6001">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6001">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6002">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6002">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6004">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6004">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6005">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6005">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6006">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6006">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6007">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6007">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6008">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6008">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6009">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6010">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6010">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6011">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6012">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6013">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6013">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6014">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6014">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6015">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6015">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6016">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6016">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6018">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6018">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6022">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6022">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6026">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6026">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6027">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6027">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6028">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6028">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6029">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6029">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6030">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6030">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6032">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6032">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6033">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6033">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6034">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6034">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6036">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6036">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6037">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6037">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6048">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6048">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6049">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6049">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6050">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6051">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6051">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6052">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6052">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6053">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6053">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6054">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6054">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6055">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6055">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6056">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6057">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6057">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6058">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6058">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6059">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6060">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6061">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6062">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6063">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6063">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6064">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6064">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6065">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6065">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6066">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6067">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6067">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6090">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6090">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6091">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6091">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6092">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6093">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6093">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6095">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6095">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6096">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6097">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6097">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6098">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6099">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6100">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6100">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6101">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6101">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6114">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6114">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6119">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6119">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6120">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6120">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6122">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6122">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6124">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6124">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6125">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6126">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6126">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6127">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6129">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6129">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6130">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6130">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6132">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6132">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6156">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6156">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6157">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6157">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6158">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6159">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6159">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6160">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6161">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6161">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6162">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6163">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6163">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6164">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6165">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6166">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6166">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6167">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6167">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6168">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6168">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6169">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6169">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6170">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6170">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6171">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6171">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6172">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6172">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6173">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6173">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6177">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6177">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6178">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6178">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6179">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6180">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6180">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6182">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6182">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6183">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6184">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6184">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6185">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6186">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6186">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6187">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6187">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6188">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6188">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6190">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6190">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6228">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6228">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6229">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6230">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6230">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6231">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6232">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6232">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6233">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6233">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6234">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6234">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6235">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6235">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6236">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6236">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6237">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6237">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6238">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6238">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6239">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6239">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6240">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6241">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6241">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6242">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6243">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6243">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6244">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6244">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6245">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6245">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6247">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6247">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6248">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6248">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6250">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6250">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6251">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6251">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6252">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6252">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6253">wearde tafoege 세금 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6253">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6254">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6254">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6256">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6256">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6258">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6258">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6260">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6260">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6261">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6261">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6262">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6262">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6263">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6263">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6264">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6264">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6265">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6265">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6266">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6266">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6267">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6267">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6268">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6268">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6269">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6270">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6270">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6271">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6272">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6272">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6273">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6273">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6274">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6274">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6276">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6276">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6284">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6284">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6286">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6286">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6288">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6288">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6289">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6289">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6290">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6290">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6292">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6295">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6295">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6296">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6296">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6297">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6297">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6298">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6298">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

international driving permit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6361">international driving permit</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6363">nz 자동차 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6363">nz automobile association</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6364">새 뉴질랜드 자동차 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6364">new zealand automobile association</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6365">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6365">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6366">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6367">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6367">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6368">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6369">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6369">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6370">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6370">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6371">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6371">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6372">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6372">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6373">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6373">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6374">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6374">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6375">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6376">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6378">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6379">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6379">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6380">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6380">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6382">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6382">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6383">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6383">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6384">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6384">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6385">ird 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6385">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6386">ird 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6386">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6387">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6387">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6388">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6388">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6389">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6389">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6390">inland 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6390">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6391">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6391">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6393">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6393">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6395">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6395">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6400">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6400">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6401">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6401">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6402">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6402">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6403">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6403">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6404">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6404">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6405">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6405">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6406">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6406">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6407">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6407">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6408">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6408">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6409">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6409">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6411">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6411">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6413">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6414">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6415">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6416">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6417">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6418">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6419">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6420">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6422">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6422">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6423">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6424">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6425">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6425">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6426">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6429">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6429">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6430">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6430">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6431">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6431">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6432">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6432">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6433">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6433">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6434">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6435">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6436">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6438">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6439">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6440">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6441">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6442">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6443">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6445">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6445">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6446">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6447">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6448">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6449">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6449">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6450">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6451">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6460">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6461">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6462">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6462">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6464">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6465">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6465">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6466">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6466">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6467">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6468">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6469">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6470">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6471">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6472">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6473">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6474">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6475">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6476">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6476">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6477">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6477">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6479">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6479">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6480">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6480">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6482">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6482">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6483">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6485">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6485">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6487">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6487">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6488">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6488">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6489">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6489">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6490">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6490">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6491">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6491">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6492">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6492">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6493">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6494">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6494">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6495">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6496">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6496">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6497">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6497">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6498">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6498">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6499">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6499">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6500">Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6500">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6504">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6504">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6505">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6505">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6506">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6506">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6507">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6507">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6508">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6508">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6509">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6509">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6510">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6510">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6511">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6511">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6512">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6512">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6513">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6513">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6514">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6514">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6515">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6516">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6516">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6518">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6518">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6519">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6520">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6520">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6521">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6523">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6523">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6524">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6524">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6525">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6525">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6526">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6527">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6527">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6528">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6528">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6529">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6529">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6530">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6530">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6531">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6531">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6532">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6532">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6533">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6533">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6534">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6534">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6535">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6535">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6536">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6536">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6537">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6537">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6539">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6539">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6541">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6541">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6542">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6543">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6543">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6545">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6545">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6546">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6546">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6547">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6547">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6548">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6548">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6560">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6560">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6561">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6561">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6562">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6563">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6563">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6564">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6565">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6565">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6567">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6567">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6570">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6570">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6571">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6571">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6572">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6572">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6573">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6573">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6574">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6574">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6575">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6575">Numer paszportu</span></span>
