- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6578">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6578">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6579">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6579">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6580">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6581">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6581">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6583">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6583">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6584">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6584">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6585">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6585">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6586">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6586">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6587">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6587">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6588">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6588">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6589">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6589">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6590">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6590">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6591">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6591">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6592">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6592">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6593">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6593">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6594">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6594">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6595">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6595">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6612">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6612">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6613">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6613">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6615">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6615">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6617">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6617">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6618">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6619">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6619">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6620">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6621">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6622">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6622">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6623">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6623">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6625">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6625">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6638">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6638">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6642">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6642">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6643">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6643">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6644">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6644">taxnumber</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6655">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6655">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6656">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6656">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6657">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6657">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6658">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6659">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6659">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6661">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6661">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6662">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6663">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6663">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6664">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6665">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6666">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6666">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6667">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6667">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6673">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6673">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6674">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6674">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6675">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6675">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6676">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6676">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6677">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6677">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6678">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6678">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6679">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6679">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6680">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6680">national id card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6683">número de identificação 민사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6683">número de identificação civil</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6684">número de identificação 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6684">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6686">포르투갈 bi 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6686">portugal bi number</span></span>


## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6687">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6687">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6688">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6689">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6690">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6690">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6692">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6692">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6693">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6693">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6694">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6694">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6695">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6695">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6696">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6696">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6697">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6697">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6698">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6699">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6699">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6700">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6701">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6702">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6702">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6703">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6703">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6704">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6704">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6709">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6709">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6710">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6710">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6711">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6711">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6712">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6712">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6713">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6713">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6714">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6714">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6715">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6715">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6716">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6716">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6717">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6717">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6718">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6718">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6719">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6719">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6720">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6720">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6721">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6722">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6722">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6724">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6724">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6725">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6725">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6726">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6726">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6727">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6728">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6731">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6731">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6732">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6732">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6733">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6733">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6734">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6734">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6735">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6735">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6736">포르투갈어 passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6736">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6737">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6737">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6738">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6738">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6739">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6739">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6740">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6742">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6742">nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6744">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6744">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6745">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6746">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6748">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6748">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6749">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6749">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6750">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6750">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6751">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6752">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6752">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6777">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6777">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6778">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6778">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6779">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6780">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6780">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6782">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6782">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6783">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6783">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6784">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6784">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6785">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6786">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6786">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6788">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6788">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6789">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6789">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6790">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6790">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6791">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6791">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6795">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6795">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6796">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6796">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6797">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6797">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6798">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6798">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6799">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6799">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6800">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6800">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6801">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6801">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6802">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6802">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6803">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6803">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6804">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6804">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6805">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6805">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6806">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6806">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6807">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6807">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6808">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6809">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6809">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6810">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6811">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6811">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6812">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6813">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6813">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6814">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6816">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6816">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6817">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6817">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6819">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6819">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6820">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6820">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6821">Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6821">Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6822">cnp #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6822">cnp#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6830">id-ul taxei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6830">id-ul taxei</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6831">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6831">insurance number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6870">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6870">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6871">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6873">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6873">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6875">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6875">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6876">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6877">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6877">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6880">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6880">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6881">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6881">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6882">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6883">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6883">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6884">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6884">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6885">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6885">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6886">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6886">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6887">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6887">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6888">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6888">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6889">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6889">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6890">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6891">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6891">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6892">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6892">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6893">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6893">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6894">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6895">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6895">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6896">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6897">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6897">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6898">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6898">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6899">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6899">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6950">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6950">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6951">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6952">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6952">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6953">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6954">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6954">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6955">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6955">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6956">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6956">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6957">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6957">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6958">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6958">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6959">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6959">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6960">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6960">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6961">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6961">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6962">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6962">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6963">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6963">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6964">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6964">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6965">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6965">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6966">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6966">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6968">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6968">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6969">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6969">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6970">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6970">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6971">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6971">passport id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6972">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6972">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6973">passportnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6973">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6974">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6974">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6975">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6975">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6976">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6976">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6977">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6977">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6978">паспорт #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6978">паспорт#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6979">паспортid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6979">паспортid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6980">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6980">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6981">номерпаспорта #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6981">номерпаспорта#</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6982">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6982">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6983">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6984">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6984">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6986">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6986">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6987">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6987">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6988">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6988">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6989">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6989">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6990">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6991">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6993">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6994">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6994">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6995">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6995">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-6996">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-6996">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7001">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7001">passport id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7005">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7005">паспорт id</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7012">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7012">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7014">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7014">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7016">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7016">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7017">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7017">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7018">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7018">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7019">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7019">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7020">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7020">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7021">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7021">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7022">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7022">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7023">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7023">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7024">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7024">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7025">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7025">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7026">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7026">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7027">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7027">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7028">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7028">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7029">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7029">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7030">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7031">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7031">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7032">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7033">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7033">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7034">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7034">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7035">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7035">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7036">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7036">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7037">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7038">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7038">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7039">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7040">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7041">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7041">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7042">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7042">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7043">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7043">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7044">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7045">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7045">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7046">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7046">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7057">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7057">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7058">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7058">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7060">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7060">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7062">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7062">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7063">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7063">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7064">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7064">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7065">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7066">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7066">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7067">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7069">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7069">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7070">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7070">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7086">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7086">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7087">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7087">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7088">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7088">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7089">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7089">ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7090">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7091">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7091">ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7092">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7093">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7094">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7095">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7095">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7096">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7096">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7097">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7098">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7098">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7099">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7099">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7146">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7146">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7147">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7147">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7148">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7149">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7149">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7150">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7151">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7151">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7152">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7153">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7156">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7156">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7157">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7157">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7158">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7158">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7159">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7159">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7160">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7160">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7163">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7163">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7164">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7164">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7165">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7165">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7167">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7167">ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7169">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7169">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7170">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7171">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7171">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7172">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7174">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7174">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7175">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7175">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7222">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7222">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7223">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7224">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7225">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7225">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7227">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7227">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7229">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7232">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7232">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7233">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7233">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7234">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7234">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7249">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7249">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7250">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7251">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7252">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7252">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7254">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7254">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7255">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7255">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7256">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7256">two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7257">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7257">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7258">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7258">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7259">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7260">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7260">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7262">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7262">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7263">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7263">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7264">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7264">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7265">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7265">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7266">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7266">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
