## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7294">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7294">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7295">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7295">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7296">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7297">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7297">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7299">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7299">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7300">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7300">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7301">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7301">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7302">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7302">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7303">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7304">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7304">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7305">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7306">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7306">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7307">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7308">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7309">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7309">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7310">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7310">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7311">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7311">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7312">슬로베니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7312">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7313">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7313">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7314">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7314">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7315">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7315">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7316">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7316">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7317">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7318">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7318">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7319">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7320">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7320">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7321">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7322">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7322">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7323">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7324">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7324">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7325">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7325">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7326">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7326">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7327">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7327">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7328">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7328">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7352">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7352">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7354">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7354">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7356">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7356">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7357">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7357">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7358">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7358">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7359">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7359">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7360">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7360">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7361">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7361">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7363">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7366">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7366">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7367">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7367">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7368">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7369">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7369">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7370">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7370">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7371">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7371">Identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7373">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7373">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7374">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7374">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7375">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7376">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7376">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7377">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7378">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7378">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7379">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7379">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7380">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7380">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7381">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7381">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7382">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7382">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7383">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7383">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7384">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7384">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7385">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7386">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7386">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7387">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7388">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7388">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7389">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7389">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7390">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7390">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7391">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7391">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7392">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7393">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7393">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7394">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7394">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7395">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7395">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7396">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7396">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7397">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7397">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7398">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7398">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7399">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7399">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7400">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7400">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7401">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7401">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7402">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7402">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7403">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7403">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7404">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7405">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7405">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7407">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7407">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7408">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7408">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7409">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7409">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7411">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7411">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7414">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7414">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7415">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7415">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7452">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7452">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7453">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7453">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7454">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7455">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7455">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7457">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7457">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7458">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7458">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7459">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7459">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7460">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7461">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7461">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7464">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7464">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7465">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7465">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7489">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7489">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7490">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7490">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7491">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7492">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7492">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7493">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7494">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7494">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7495">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7495">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7496">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7496">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7497">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7497">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7498">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7499">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7499">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7500">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7502">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7502">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7503">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7503">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7515">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7515">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7516">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7516">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7517">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7518">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7518">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7519">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7519">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7520">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7520">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7521">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7521">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7522">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7522">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7523">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7523">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7524">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7524">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7525">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7525">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7526">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7527">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7527">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7528">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7529">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7530">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7530">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7531">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7532">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7532">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7533">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7533">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7534">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7534">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7535">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7535">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7536">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7537">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7537">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7539">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7539">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7540">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7540">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7541">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7541">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7542">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7542">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7543">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7543">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7544">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7544">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7545">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7545">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7546">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7546">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7547">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7547">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7548">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7548">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7549">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7549">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7550">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7550">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7551">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7551">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7552">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7552">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7553">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7553">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7554">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7554">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7555">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7555">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7556">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7556">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7557">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7557">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7558">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7559">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7559">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7561">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7562">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7562">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7563">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7563">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7564">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7564">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7565">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7565">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7596">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7596">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7597">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7598">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7598">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7600">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7600">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7601">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7601">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7602">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7602">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7603">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7603">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7604">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7604">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7605">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7605">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7606">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7606">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7607">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7611">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7612">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7612">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7613">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7613">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7614">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7614">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7615">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7615">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7617">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7617">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7618">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7618">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7619">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7619">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7620">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7620">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7621">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7621">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7622">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7622">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7623">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7623">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7624">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7624">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7625">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7625">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7626">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7626">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7627">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7627">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7628">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7628">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7629">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7629">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7630">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7630">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7631">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7631">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7632">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7632">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7633">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7633">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7634">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7634">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7635">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7635">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7636">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7636">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7637">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7637">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7638">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7638">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7639">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7639">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7640">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7640">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7641">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7641">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7642">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7642">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7643">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7643">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7644">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7645">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7645">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7647">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7647">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7648">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7648">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7649">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7649">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7650">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7650">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7651">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7652">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7652">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7653">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7654">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7655">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7655">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7656">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7656">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7657">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7658">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7658">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7659">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7659">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7660">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7660">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7661">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7661">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7662">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7662">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7663">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7663">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7664">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7664">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7665">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7665">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7666">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7666">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7667">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7667">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7668">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7668">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7669">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7669">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7670">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7670">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7671">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7671">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7672">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7672">Sweden national ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7673">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7673">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7674">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7675">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7675">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7677">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7677">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7678">2-4 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7678">two to four digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7679">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7679">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7680">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7680">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7681">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7681">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7682">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7683">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7685">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7685">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7686">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7686">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7687">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7688">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7688">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7689">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7689">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7690">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7690">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7691">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7692">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7693">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7693">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7695">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7695">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7697">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7700">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7700">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7701">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7701">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7702">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7702">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7703">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7703">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7734">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7734">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7735">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7735">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7736">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7737">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7737">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7739">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7739">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7740">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7740">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7741">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7741">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7742">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7742">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7743">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7743">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7744">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7744">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7745">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7746">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7748">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7748">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7749">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7750">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7750">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7751">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7752">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7752">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7753">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7753">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7754">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7754">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7755">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7755">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7756">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7756">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7757">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7757">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7758">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7758">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7759">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7759">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7760">개인 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7760">personal identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7761">personnummer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7761">personnummer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7762">personligt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7762">personligt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7763">unikt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7763">unikt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7764">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7764">personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7765">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7765">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7766">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7766">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7767">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7767">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7768">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7768">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7769">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7769">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7770">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7771">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7771">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7772">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7773">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7773">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7774">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7774">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7775">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7775">a plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7776">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7776">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7777">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7777">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7778">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7778">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7779">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7779">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7780">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7781">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7781">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7784">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7784">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7785">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7785">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7786">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7787">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7787">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7813">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7813">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7815">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7815">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7817">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7817">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7818">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7818">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7819">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7819">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7820">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7820">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7821">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7821">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7822">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7822">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7823">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7824">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7825">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7826">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7827">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7827">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7828">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7828">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7862">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7862">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7863">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7864">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7864">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7865">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7866">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7866">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7867">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7867">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7868">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7868">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7869">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7869">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7870">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7870">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7871">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7871">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7872">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7872">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7873">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7873">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7874">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7875">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7878">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7878">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7879">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7879">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7880">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7880">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7881">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7881">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
