- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7897">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7897">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7898">einzigartige identität nicht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7898">einzigartige identität nicht</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7899">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7899">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7900">id personnelle id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7900">identification personnelle id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7901">
numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7901">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7902">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7902">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7903">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7904">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7904">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7905">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7906">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7906">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7907">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7907">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7908">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7908">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7909">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7911">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7914">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7914">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7915">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7915">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7916">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7918">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7918">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7919">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7919">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7920">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7920">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7921">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7921">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7922">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7922">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7923">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7923">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7924">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7924">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7925">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7925">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7926">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7926">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7927">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7927">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7928">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7928">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7929">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7929">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7930">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7930">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7931">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7931">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7932">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7932">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7933">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7933">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7934">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7934">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7935">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7935">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7936">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7936">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7937">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7937">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7938">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7938">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7939">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7939">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7940">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7941">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7941">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7942">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7942">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7943">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7943">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7944">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7944">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7945">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7945">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7946">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7947">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7947">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7950">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7950">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7951">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7951">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7952">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7952">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7954">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7954">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7955">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7955">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7956">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7956">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7957">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7957">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7958">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7958">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7959">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7959">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7960">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7960">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7961">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7961">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7962">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7962">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7963">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7964">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7964">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7966">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7966">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7967">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7967">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7968">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7968">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7969">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7970">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7972">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7972">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7973">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7973">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7974">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7974">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7975">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7975">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7976">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7976">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7977">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7977">Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7979">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7979">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7980">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7980">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7981">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7981">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7982">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7982">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7983">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7983">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7984">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7984">TARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7986">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7986">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7987">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7987">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7988">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7988">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7989">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7990">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7990">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7991">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7992">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7992">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7993">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7993">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7994">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7994">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7995">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7996">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7996">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7997">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7998">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-7999">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-7999">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8000">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8000">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8001">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8001">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8002">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8002">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8011">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8011">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8012">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8013">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8013">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8014">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8015">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8015">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8016">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8017">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8017">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8018">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8019">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8019">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8020">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8020">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8021">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8021">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8022">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8023">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8023">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8024">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8024">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8025">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8025">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8026">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8026">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8027">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8027">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8029">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8029">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8030">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8030">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8031">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8031">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8032">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8032">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8033">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8033">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8034">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8034">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8035">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8035">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8036">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8036">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8037">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8037">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8038">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8038">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8039">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8039">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8040">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8040">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8041">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8041">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8042">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8043">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8043">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8044">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8046">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8046">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8047">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8047">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8048">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8048">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8054">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8054">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8055">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8055">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8056">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8056">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8057">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8057">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8058">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8058">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8059">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8059">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8060">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8060">learner drivers</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8061">licence holder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8061">licence holder</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8062">licence holders</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8062">licence holders</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8063">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8063">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8064">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8064">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8065">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8065">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8066">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8066">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8067">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8067">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8068">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8069">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8069">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8070">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8071">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8071">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8072">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8073">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8074">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8075">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8075">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8076">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8076">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8077">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8077">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8078">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8078">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8079">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8079">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8080">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8080">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8081">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8081">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8082">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8082">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8083">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8083">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8084">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8084">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8085">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8085">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8086">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8087">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8087">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8089">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8089">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8090">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8090">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8091">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8091">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8092">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8092">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8093">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8093">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8094">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8094">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8095">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8096">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8098">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8099">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8099">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8100">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8100">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8101">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8101">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8102">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8102">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8103">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8103">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8104">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8107">국립 보건 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8107">national health service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8110">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8110">health authority</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8112">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8112">patient id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8122">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8122">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8123">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8123">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8124">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8124">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8125">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8126">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8126">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8128">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8128">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8129">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8129">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8130">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8130">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8131">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8131">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8132">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8132">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8133">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8133">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8134">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8134">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8135">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8135">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8136">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8136">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8137">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8137">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8138">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8138">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8139">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8139">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8140">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8140">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8141">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8141">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8142">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8143">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8145">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8146">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8146">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8147">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8147">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8148">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8149">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8149">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8150">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8150">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8163">great britain</span></span>

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8172">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8172">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8173">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8173">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8174">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8174">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8175">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8176">UTR (unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8176">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8177">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8178">UTR (unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8178">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8179">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8180">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8180">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8182">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8183">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8183">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8184">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8184">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8204">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8204">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8205">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8206">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8206">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8208">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8208">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8209">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8210">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8210">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8211">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8212">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8213">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8213">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8214">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8214">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8244">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8244">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8245">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8246">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8246">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8248">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8248">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8249">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8249">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8250">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8250">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8251">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8252">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8252">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8253">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8254">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8254">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8255">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8255">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8256">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8256">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8257">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8257">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8258">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8258">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8259">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8259">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8260">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8260">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8261">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8261">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8262">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8262">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8360">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8360">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8362">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8362">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8364">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8364">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8365">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8365">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8366">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8366">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8367">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8367">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8368">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8368">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8369">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8369">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8370">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8370">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8371">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8371">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8372">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8372">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8373">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8373">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8374">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8374">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8375">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8375">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8376">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8376">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8377">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8378">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8379">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8380">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8381">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8381">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8382">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8382">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8383">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8383">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8384">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8384">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8385">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8385">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8386">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8386">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8388">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8388">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8389">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8389">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8390">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8390">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8391">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8391">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8392">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8392">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8393">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8393">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8394">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8394">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8395">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8395">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8396">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8396">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8397">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8397">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8398">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8398">itin</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8413">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8413">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8414">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8415">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8415">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8416">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8416">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8418">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8418">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8419">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8419">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8423">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8424">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8424">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8427">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8427">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8428">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8428">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8430">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8430">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8431">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8431">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8432">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8433">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8433">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8434">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8434">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8435">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8436">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8436">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8437">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8437">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8452">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8452">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8453">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8453">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8454">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8454">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8455">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8455">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8456">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8457">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8457">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8458">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8459">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8459">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8460">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8461">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8464">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8464">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8465">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8465">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8486">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8486">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8487">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8488">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8488">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8490">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8490">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8492">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8495">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8495">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8496">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8496">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8500">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8500">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8501">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8501">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8505">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8505">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8506">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8507">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8507">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8509">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8509">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8511">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8511">six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8513">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8513">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8516">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8516">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4dde7-8517">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4dde7-8517">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
